name: Peppers (Bell Peppers)
properties: Contains nicotine-like compounds that may boost metabolism
benefits: Peppers have a nicotine edge described in the Amping AMPK section that may help with weight loss. High water content and low calorie density make them ideal for weight loss. Featured in multiple recipes including ratatouille and gazpacho.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen vegetables - multiple servings daily

quotes: Peppers have that nicotine edge I described in Amping AMPK.
